channel.title: Looking for Feedback on a Delta Green Character Keeper
channel.description:
I am setting up a Character Keeper for Delta Green for use in an upcoming game (which isn't ready yet, so don't ask). This is my first pass at a full one, so I'm mainly wondering if it makes sense? Have I left anything out? Added too much?
Here's a link to the Google Sheet. I'm still populating the "Pregens" tab, but everything else is ready to look at. All feedback, good or bad, is welcomed. Thanks.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16vV4OqR_xgXLbbEHi12WSZYlc9LM2yIly4LMSpIwloo/edit?usp=sharing

item.title: Looking for Feedback on a Delta Green Character Keeper
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

I always like to see some kind of rules summary so I don’t have to have the pdf open at the same time, so that gets a tick from me.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Feedback on a Delta Green Character Keeper

item.title: Looking for Feedback on a Delta Green Character Keeper
item.dc:creator: @PaleoGamer
item.description:
@PaleoGamer wrote:

I am setting up a Character Keeper for Delta Green for use in an upcoming game (which isn’t ready yet, so don’t ask). This is my first pass at a full one, so I’m mainly wondering if it makes sense? Have I left anything out? Added too much?

Here’s a link to the Google Sheet. I’m still populating the “Pregens” tab, but everything else is ready to look at. All feedback, good or bad, is welcomed. Thanks.

docs.google.com

Delta Green Character Keeper

Welcome Working Group Phoenix is a Delta Green campaign set in the modern-day. You are part of a covert group within the United States Government. One that knows of the Unnatural and is dedicated to stopping it and preventing the knowledge of it...

Read full topic
